parameters: If Mother and her wardens never came back, what makes you think that you would!
What are you going to do, cast Emerge? My runes can take it.
I have something stronger than emerge.
Self Switch: A B C D
Greetings Ares, long time no see!
How was your trip to Vulcas?
Haha, It was great! Their magi guild tested a new golem against
me. You would have loved to see it!
Collapse the wall and sieze them!
Sorry, princess Lussuria. I got orders!

You have around 2 minutes before Ares breaks in.
Get whatever the hells you need to get and go!
Journey to Ouranos: Gather whatever equipment you deem most neccessary and depart before Ares can stop you!
